results.rule_description: S3 Bucket should have encryption enabled
results.impact: The bucket contents could be read if compromised
results.resolution: Configure server-side encryption for S3 bucket
results.description: Resource 'aws_s3_bucket.data' does not have encryption enabled

results.rule_description: EC2 instance should not have public IP
results.impact: Instance exposed to internet increases attack surface
results.description: Resource 'aws_instance.web' has a public IP address

results.rule_description: IAM policy should not use wildcards
results.impact: Overly permissive policies can lead to privilege escalation
results.resolution: Specify explicit resources instead of wildcards

results.impact: Data at rest could be compromised if storage is accessed
results.resolution: Enable storage_encrypted on the RDS instance
results.description: Resource 'aws_db_instance.main' does not have storage encryption
